lyrics:
18 contributorsbeautiful lyricsintro kylie minogue
you you are so beautiful

verse 1 kylie minogue  enrique iglesias
it used to be
you and me
love like no other
the world around
could fall apart
but we had each other

verse 2 kylie minogue  enrique iglesias
saw you walking you were smiling
and it hit me like the first time
feels like yesterday has come and gone
but nothings changed when i look at you

chorus 1 kylie minogue  enrique iglesias
you you are so beautiful
you you are so beautiful

chorus 2 kylie minogue  enrique iglesias
and now i
i just want you to know
that after all this time
youre still the one
see kylie minogue liveget tickets as low as 275you might also likeverse 3 kylie minogue  enrique iglesias
still hurts sometimes
love on the line
but we said forever
sailing on
through the storms
but we held together

chorus 2 kylie minogue  enrique iglesias
and now i
i just want you to know
that after all this time
youre still the one

you you are so beautiful
you you are so beautiful
